top_comments.comment: Tomorrow is my sons birthday and seeing all these costumes makes me want to wake him up and let him dress as his costume for 2 days in a row 😂

Wow they really went all out for Halloween!! Nicely done too!!
I'm attending a Halloween party myself as Jason Voorhees or something this is so cool😂😂😂😂
